courses.title: Communication (Core)
courses.prerequisite: For all 010 courses: Satisfactory scores on English portion of ACT test and TSI examination or ENGL 0301. For ENGL 1302, a grade of 'C' or better in ENGL 1301.
courses.notes: See General Education Core for options.

courses.title: Calculus I
courses.prerequisite: MATH 2412 with a grade of 'C' or better; or passing the Precalculus Exemption Test administered by the Department of Mathematics.

courses.title: Computer Science I
courses.prerequisite: Grade 'C' or better in any of the following; MATH 1314, MATH 1414 or placement in a higher level Math courses (MATH 2412, MATH 2413) and credit for or concurrent enrollment in CSCI 1101 or CMPE 1101 or EECE 1101.

courses.title: Learning Framework
courses.notes: As required, based on credit hours earned, TSI status, High School rank, major declaration. May apply as free elective.

courses.title: Communication (Core)
courses.prerequisite: For all 010 courses: Satisfactory scores on English portion of ACT test and TSI examination or ENGL 0301. For ENGL 1302, a grade of 'C' or better in ENGL 1301.
courses.notes: See General Education Core for options.

courses.title: Calculus II
courses.prerequisite: MATH 2413 (or MATH 2487) with a grade of 'C' or better.

courses.title: Computer Science II
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in: [[CSCI 1370 or CMPE 1370] and [CSCI 1170 or CMPE 1170]] or CSCI 1470 or CSCI 1390.

courses.title: Life and Physical Sciences (Core)

courses.notes: Options: BIOL 1406, BIOL 1407, BIOL 2401, BIOL 2402, CHEM 1311 or CHEM 1309, CHEM 1312, PHYS 1401 or PHYS 2425, PHYS 1402 or PHYS 2426.

courses.title: Programming in Unix/ Linux Environment
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in: CSCI 1470 or CSCI 1390 or [ [CSCI 1370 or CSCI 1378 or CMPE 1370 or CMPE 1378] and [CSCI 1170 or CSCI 1178 or CMPE 1170 or CMPE 1178] ].

courses.title: Object Oriented Programming in Java or Object-Oriented Programming in C# or Object-Oriented Programming in Python
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in: [[CSCI 1370 or CMPE 1370] and [CSCI 1170 or CMPE 1170]] or CSCI 1470 or CSCI 1390.
courses.notes: Options: CSCI 3326 or CSCI 3327 or CSCI 3328 or CSCI 3329.

courses.title: Computer Organization and Assembly Language
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in: CSCI 1470 or CSCI 1390 or [ [CSCI 1370 or CMPE 1370] and [CSCI 1170 or CMPE 1170] ].

courses.title: Mathematical Foundations of Computer Science
courses.prerequisite: Grade of C or better in: [MATH 2413 or MATH 2487] and [CSCI 1470 or CSCI 1390 or [ [CSCI 1370 or CMPE 1370 or CSCI 1378 or CMPE 1378] and [CSCI 1170 or CSCI 1178 or CMPE 1170 or CMPE 1178] ].

courses.title: Technical Communication
courses.prerequisite: 6 hours of English.

courses.title: Software Engineering I

courses.title: Computer Science Prescribed Elective - Databases, Architecture, Networking, and Operating Systems
courses.prerequisite: CSCI 3333 for Databases; [CSCI 2380 or CMPE 2380] and [CSCI 2333 or CMPE 2333 or ELEE 3435 or CMPE 3437 or EECE 3435] for Architecture, Networking, and Operating Systems.
courses.notes: Choose from: CSCI 4333 Database Design and Implementation or CSCI 4334 Operating Systems or CSCI 4335 Computer Architecture or CSCI 4345 Computer Networks.

courses.title: Linear Algebra
courses.prerequisite: MATH 2413 (or MATH 2487) with a grade of 'C' or better.
